title: Govindam
description: Restaurant of the Hare Krishna movement 2014 opened in new premises (an old mansion). Initially open only two days a week but has plans to expand the opening hours. Offers Indian influenced lacto-vegetarian dishes with two options: a limited plate for a lesser price or a complete all you can eat set for 12 euros. Typically contains a soup, rice with subji (veg curry), salad or raita and puri, samosa or some other deep fried Indian dish. Sweets can be bought separately. Also has a Sunday feast which consists of a large variety of dishes served at the end of a temple program. The Sunday feast starts at 4pm every Sunday, is free of charge (donations accepted) and welcomes everyone independent of religious orientation.
